text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Braga | native_name = | native_name_lang = pt | settlement_type = District | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_flag = | image_seal = | image_shield = BRG.png | image_map = LocalDistritoBraga.svg | map_caption = | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Portugal | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Norte | subdivision_type2 = Historical province | subdivision_name2 = Minho | subdivision_type3 = No. of municipalities | subdivision_name3 = 14 | subdivision_type4 = No. of parishes | subdivision_name4 = 515 | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Braga | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 2,673 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 831,368 | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = PT-03 | website = | footnotes = | blank_name_sec1 = No. of parliamentary representatives | blank_info_sec1 = 19 }} The district of Braga () is a district in the northwest of Portugal. The district capital is the city of Braga. It is bordered by the district of Viana do Castelo in the north, Vila Real in the east, Galicia (a Spanish autonomous community) in the northeast and Porto in the south. Its area is . 831,368 people live there. == Municipalities == The district has 14 municipalities: * Amares * Barcelos * Braga * Cabeceiras de Basto * Celorico de Basto * Esposende * Fafe * Guimarães * Póvoa de Lanhoso * Terras de Bouro * Vieira do Minho * Vila Nova de Famalicão * Vila Verde * Vizela
title: Braga District
